Yes &#9; No ( X ) &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; NOTICE TO THE MARKET &nbsp; Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands, November 25, 2022 &#8211; Nu Holdings Ltd. (&#8220;Company&#8221;) hereby informs its shareholders and the market that, on November 18, 2022, the Central Bank of Brazil (&quot;BCB&quot;) postponed the effective date of the BCB Resolutions 197, 198, 199, 200, 201 and 202, from January 1, 2023, to July 1, 2023. These resolutions were the object of the Notice to the Market disclosed by the Company on March 14, 2022. &nbsp; &nbsp; Contacts: Investor Contact: Jorg Friedemann investors@nubank.com.br &nbsp; Media Contact: Leila Suwwan press@nubank.com.br &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; SIGNATURES Pursuant to the requirements of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the registrant has duly caused this report to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned, thereunto duly authorized. &nbsp; &nbsp; Nu Holdings Ltd. &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; By:&nbsp; /s/ Jorg Friedemann &nbsp; &nbsp; Jorg Friedemann Investor Relations Officer &nbsp; Date:&nbsp;&nbsp;November 25, 2022 &nbsp;
